articles.description: The bidding was majorly driven by retail bidders, whose portion was subscribed 81 per cent. Employee quota was subscribed 40 per cent, whereas HNI quota received only three per cent bids so far. The institutional quota did not see any bids yet.
articles.content: New Delhi: The Rs 538.61 crore initial public offering (IPO) of Prudent Corporate Advisory Services received a muted response from investors as the issue received 57 per cent bids so far on the secon… [+2126 chars]

articles.title: This Rakesh Jhunjhunwala owned stock has tanked 65% from its 52-week high - Business Standard
articles.description: In the past one month, the market price of Nazara Technologies has tanked 29 per cent, as compared to a 8 per cent decline in the S&P BSE Sensex.
